00063 void parse_args(int argc, char *argv[], const Desc *desc, const Desc *hidden,
00064                 const PositionalDesc *p) {
00065   const Desc &pub_desc = description();
00066 
00067   try {
00068     command_line_parser parser(argc, argv);
00069     Desc full(pub_desc);
00070 
00071     if (hidden)
00072       full.add(*hidden);
00073 
00074     parser.options(full);
00075 
00076     if (p)
00077       parser.positional(*p);
00078 
00079     store(parser.run(), varmap);
00080     notify(varmap);
00081   }
00082   catch (std::exception &e) {
00083     HT_ERROR_OUT << e.what() << HT_END;
00084     std::cout << pub_desc << std::endl;
00085     exit(1);
00086   }
00087 
00088   // some builtin behavior
00089   if (varmap.count("help")) {
00090     std::cout << pub_desc << std::endl;
00091     std::exit(1);
00092   }
00093 
00094   if (varmap.count("version")) {
00095     std::cout << version() << std::endl;
00096     std::exit(1);
00097   }
00098 
00099   String loglevel = varmap["log-level"].as<String>();
00100 
00101   if (loglevel == "info")
00102     Logger::set_level(Logger::Priority::INFO);
00103   else if (loglevel == "debug")
00104     Logger::set_level(Logger::Priority::DEBUG);
00105   else if (loglevel == "error")
00106     Logger::set_level(Logger::Priority::ERROR);
00107   else {
00108     HT_ERROR_OUT << "unknown log level: "<< loglevel << HT_END;
00109     std::exit(1);
00110   }
00111 
00112   cfgfile = varmap.count("config") ? varmap["config"].as<String>() :
00113       format("%s/conf/hypertable.cfg", System::install_dir.c_str());
00114 }
